Hey there! The moment has finally arrived, and #e#rAran, the polearm-wielding hero,#k#n has joined Maple World! We can't let a monumental event like this slide, right? So I'm inviting you to join the #e#bAran Welcome Celebration#k#n! You can get lots of prizes!

In order to receive a prize, you have to pass two tests. #bFirst, you must take care of this ice crystal I am about to give you for one whole hour, and second, you must acquire the Maha Charm inside the crystal.#k You can't shatter the crystal using brute force, but if you hold it close to you, your body heat will steadily melt it. But be careful! #rIf you log out, it'll disappear forever.#k So be patient, okay?
Are you going let the oppportunity of a lifetime pass you by?
